webtoolsmanager-error-nopermission: An error message showing for users who have no permission to view Special:WebToolsManager
webtoolsmanager-specialpage-link: Text for the link to the Special:WebToolsManager page
webtoolsmanager-specialpage-title: Title of the special page Special:WebToolsManager
webtoolsmanager-analytics: Section title for the analytics part of the configuration form in Special:WebToolsManager
webtoolsmanager-form-help-example:
Prefix text for an example. Parameters:
* $1 The actual example to feature.
webtoolsmanager-form-analytics-google-id: Label for the field accepting a Google Analytics ID
Explanation for the field that holds the Google Analytics ID in the Special:WebToolsManager form. Skipping that form field will disable that functionality.
Text for the error message that is shown when the Google Analytics ID is malformed.
webtoolsmanager-form-analytics-google-an: Text for the field that sets anonymizing the IPs in Google Analytics
webtoolsmanager-form-analytics-exclude-t: Text for the field that accepts titles to exclude from tracking.
webtoolsmanager-opengraph: Section title for the Open Graph part of the configuration form in Special:WebToolsManager.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-activate: Label for the checkbox that enables Open Graph tags on the wiki in the Special:WebToolsManager form.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-fallbackO: Label for the checkbox that tells the system to fall back on the wiki logo if no image is set to an article, in the Special:WebToolsManager form.
Explanation for the checkbox that tells the system to fall back on the wiki logo in Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-descripti: Label for the wiki description field for the Open Graph settings in Special:WebToolsManager form
Explanation for the description field for the Open Graph settings in Special:WebToolsManager form.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-facebook-: Label for the field that holds the Facebook App ID in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form
Explanation for the field that holds the Facbook App ID in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form. Skipping that form field will disable that meta tag.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-twitter-s: Label for the field that holds the twitter handle for the wiki in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form
Explanation for the field that holds the twitter handle for the wiki in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form. Skipping that form field will disable that meta tag.
webtoolsmanager-form-opengraph-twitter-c: Label for the field that holds the twitter handle of the creator of the wiki in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form
Explanation for the field that holds the twitter handle for the creator of the wiki in the Open Graph section of the Special:WebToolsManager form. Skipping that form field will disable that meta tag.
